Package com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.core.graphics

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IRenderer
    Base interface for Rendering classes
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DebugOverlay
    Default Renderer, for more control you can either extend this class or create your own that implements IRenderer
    DefaultRenderer
    Default Renderer, for more control you can either extend this class or create your own that implements IRenderer
    ZbeAnimation
    Placeholder: Possibility of adding extra functionality like a frame duration per individual frame etc.
    ZbeOrthographicCamera
    Extended functionality on the LibGDX Orthographic camera
